p: Mean germination percentage in the four temperature regimes and the five water potentials was negatively correlated with seed mass, but these relationships were not significant (Figure 4a,b). Similarly, mean germination percentage was negatively correlated with seed area, which also was not significant (for temperature: R 2 = 0.055, p = 0.318; for water potential: R 2 = 0.103, p = 0.167).
